steps.title: [important:"!!! DO NOT FORGET TO ADD GHOSTLINE"]
Check Edvin 2 or 3 document tab for any restriction
[important:"Always check for NO-SHOW policy of YY"]
NOTE: Voiding ticket is only possible if the ticket was issued same day
Open the ticket mask of all passenger/s
Ticket status must be on O or A
Check if the airline is allowing void
Check the current time in the respective office ID/PCC
Compare the local time both in issuing PCC and in your timeline(SABRE)
Void all tickets
[important:"Note for SABRE: WV command action must be done twice to confirm it"]
Delete all segments
Save
[important:"!!! Do IR and double check the booking"]
Proceed with Modify Order key in Edwin & select VOID
[important:"!!! DO NOT FORGET TO ADD GHOSTLINE"]
Check Edvin 2 or 3 Document for any cancellation restrictions
[important:"Check if the travel date of the customer is closely to the no-show policy of YY"]
Open the ticket mask
[important:"Ensure to check for the most restrctive fare rule in the policy "]
Check the fare rule in specific GDS one by one
1st option: SMARTFLOW and GRAPHICAL MODE
2nd option: Backdate pricing
3rd option to display fare rules
4th option to display fare rules
[important:"Identify first the number of pricing units and fare components to understand the penalty application"]
To check for pricing unit / fare component

amadeus.content: Use FQP in Smartflow and do FQN1*

steps.title: [important:"!!! Calculate the cancellation fees and make sure that the BASE FARE of the ticket is higher than our cancellation fees"]
Delete all  segments
Save
[important:"!!! DO IR and double check"]
Proceed with Modify Order Key in Edvin
[important:"!!! ALWAYS REVIEW (IF WE NEED TO ESCALATE TO BO)"]
[important:"!!! DOUBLE CHECK IN 2DOCS & FARE RULES FOR THE INFORMATION IF WE NEED TO ESCALATE IT"]\
[important:" !!! USE (ESCALATE TO BO) in REFUND TAB(REFUND BEFORE DEPARTURE)"]

Check if the travel date of the customer is closely to the no-show policy of YY

Check the fare rule in specific GDS one by one
1st option: SMARTFLOW and GRAPHICAL MODE
2nd option: Backdate pricing
3rd option to display fare rules
4th option to display fare rules

To check for pricing unit / fare component

amadeus.content: Use FQP in Smartflow and do FQN1*

steps.title: [important:"Additional command in SABRE to check for cabin classes"]
Search the avaibility of the new flight/s
Select seats
Retrieve the pnr
Price the segment that the customer intends to use
1st option to price
NOTE: FXP COMMAND (prices the classes you have selected and saves the mask)
2nd option to price
NOTE: FXB COMMAND  (prices the best available combination, check that no downgrade has been done)
Check fare difference [base to base , every tax to every tax]
[important:"NOTE! MAKE SURE NOT TO DOWNGARDE THE BAGGAGE & CABIN CLASS"]
Store the price quote
To check if the price quote was saved
Remove the unwanted segments
Save the new itinerary

[important:"Please check for restrictions if we need to (Mark the case as urgent or Urgent due to tickets policy),for our ticketing team to issue the ticket immediately"]

Check the fare rule in specific GDS one by one

steps.title: Remove the unwanted segments
Save the new itinerary
To check if the price quote was saved
[important:"!!! DO "IR" and double check"]
[important:"Please check 2 DOCS if we have to place on urgent queue if immenent travel or Sensitive airlines  -- LAST PAGE OF REBOOKING WIZARD"]
Â Proceed to âRefundâ tab in Edvin and press on "Check Claimability"Â
SHOW ITEMS - click this box once Refund tab is working Click the [important:"SHOW ITEMS"] box once the Refund tab is Working
[important:"NOTE: BASE FARE IN POSITIVE AND TAX POSITIVE      ----- MODIFY UNDER TICKET RULES AIRLINE FEE -----"]
[important:"NOTE: BASE FARE IN NEGATIVE AND TAX POSITIVE ----- MODIFY UNDER TICKET RULES TAXES -----"]
Proceed with Modify Order key in Edvin
Send the cancellation confirmation email via Edvin as per usual routine
[important:"!!! Place on URGENT QUEUE in Refund Tab if Required as per 2DOCSÂ  -- "Escalate to BO" in Refund Tab"]
Check if the ticket is within the automatic void window (REFUND TAB)
[important:"Always check for NO-SHOW policy of YY as per 2 DOCS"]
Check if the airline is allowing void
[important:"NOTE: Voiding ticket is only possible if the ticket was issued same day"]
[important:"NOTE: Please always check the date of issuance in the order summary"]
Proceed with Modify Order key in Edvin & select VOID
Send the cancellation confirmation email via Edvin as per usual routine
